description.english: Complete Challenger Series.
description.schinese: 完成网吧选拔赛。

description.english: Enter playoffs of League 2.
description.schinese: 进入乙级联赛季后赛。

description.english: Promote to League 1.
description.schinese: 晋级至甲级联赛。

description.english: Enter playoffs of League 1.
description.schinese: 进入甲级联赛季后赛。

description.english: Promote to Premiere League.
description.schinese: 晋级至超级联赛。

description.english: Enter playoffs of Premiere League.
description.schinese: 进入超级联赛季后赛。

description.english: Claim the champion of Premiere League.
description.schinese: 夺得超级联赛冠军。

description.english: Get your coach certification.
description.schinese: 获得教练等级。

description.english: Try to use Coach Note.
description.schinese: 使用了一次教练笔记。

description.english: Coach Rank reaches B.
description.schinese: 教练等级到达B。

description.english: Coach Rank reaches S.
description.schinese: 教练等级到达S。

description.english: Coach Rank reaches SS.
description.schinese: 教练等级到达SS。

description.english: Have 2500 followers in total.
description.schinese: 俱乐部总粉丝数到达2500。

description.english: Have 10000 followers in total.
description.schinese: 俱乐部总粉丝数到达10000。

description.english: Have 100000 followers in total.
description.schinese: 俱乐部总粉丝数到达100000。

description.english: At least 3 of your ahtletes are simultaneously named to the All-Season First Team.
description.schinese: 在赛季阵容一阵中占据至少3个位置。

description.english: Your athlete wins the Season Star.
description.schinese: 获得赛季最佳选手。

description.english: Gain 500 Training Points.
description.schinese: 总计获取500点训练点数。

description.english: Gain 1000 Training Points.
description.schinese: 总计获取1000点训练点数。

description.english: Gain 5000 Training Points.
description.schinese: 总计获取5000点训练点数。

description.english: Have an athlete with total attribute of 500.
description.schinese: 拥有一名能力总值500的选手。

description.english: Have an athlete with maximum attribute level of 115.
description.schinese: 拥有一名最高能力值到达115的选手。

description.english: Have an athlete with 5 level-3 skills.
description.schinese: 拥有一名装备了5个3级技能的选手。

description.english: Have an athlete with at least 3 heroes of "Legend" mastery level.
description.schinese: 拥有一名有3个宗师级英雄的选手。

description.english: Have an athlete with at least 100000 followers.
description.schinese: 拥有一名有100000名粉丝的选手。

description.english: Win a match by playing "Close Out the Game".
description.schinese: 使用“一波！”赢下一局游戏。

description.english: Achieve "Legendary" for once.
description.schinese: 完成一次超神。

description.english: Achieve "Triple Kill" for once.
description.schinese: 完成一次三杀。

description.english: Achieve "Penta Kill" for once.
description.schinese: 完成一次五杀。

description.english: Achieve "Legendary" for 20 times.
description.schinese: 完成20次超神。

description.english: Use each hero for at least once.
description.schinese: 已使用过所有英雄。

description.english: Win a match without death of ally heroes.
description.schinese: 在没有己方英雄死亡的情况下赢得一局游戏。

description.english: A single athlete gains at least 9 medals in one match.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中，单个选手获得至少9个勋章。

description.english: Achieve a kill in a fight at the enemy Hexus.
description.schinese: 在敌方基地参与的战斗中完成一次击杀。

displayName.schinese: 回马枪中枪之再来一枪

description.english: Initiate 3 fights within the same Deployment Phase.
description.schinese: 在同一回合内开启3次战斗。

description.english: Inflict over 9999 damage in a single hit during fights.
description.schinese: 战斗中一击打出9999点以上的伤害。

description.english: Have a hero with at least 2500 shield in a fight.
description.schinese: 在一场战斗中，有英雄携带至少2500点护盾。

description.english: Achieve a kill using Tivie or Palulu.
description.schinese: 让缇薇或帕露露获得1次击杀。

description.english: Achieve a kill while with the "Walking Dead" or "Dissonance" effect.
description.schinese: 在处于“行尸走肉”或“不协和音”状态下，击杀1名敌方英雄。

description.english: Use Lubos and win a "Duel" using only his special attack.
description.schinese: 使用卢波士，仅用其特殊攻击就完成一次决斗。

description.english: Use Bunu Shan and gain "Awaken" before round 45.
description.schinese: 使用单不怒，在45回合到来之前完成变身。

description.english: Use Bajie and gain 100% Crit Rate before round 50.
description.schinese: 使用八戒，在50回合到来之前获得100%以上暴击率（不计入暂时效果提供的暴击率）。

description.english: Use Lan and complete all "Step C" upgrades before round 45.
description.schinese: 使用兰，在45回合到来之前完成所有步骤C升级。

description.english: Use Xiangxi Ke and kill 1 enemy unit by her extra attack (Hero feat) and trigger extra attack again.
description.schinese: 使用客向西，在触发连斩效果时击杀一个单位并再次触发连斩。

description.english: Use Frank and increase Max HP by at least 6000 using hero feat in one match.
description.schinese: 使用法兰克，在一局中通过英雄能力额外增加至少6000最大生命值。

description.english: Use Deep Space and use "Volley" to simultaneously kill 2 enemy heroes.
description.schinese: 使用深空号，使用“齐射”一次性击杀2个敌方英雄。

description.english: Use Kaka and evolve the Stone Hound to its maximum size (trigger the Stone Curse 5 times).
description.schinese: 使用卡卡，让石魔犬成长为最大体型（触发5次石像诅咒）。

description.english: Initiate a fight that Stone Hound and Wild Heart are the only ally units, and achieve a kill.
description.schinese: 开启一场战斗，我方仅出场石魔犬和野性之魂，并且完成击杀。

description.english: Use Kid, stack "Verdict" (trigger Kid's hero feat) at least 8 times in one fight.
description.schinese: 使用基德，在一场战斗中叠加至少8次“判决结果”(触发英雄能力)。

description.english: Use Tiger Boy and play "Mischief" to Wukong.
description.schinese: 使用虎娃对悟空打出恶作剧出击。

description.english: Make the enemy Miki absent from a Dragon teamfight.
description.schinese: 让敌方的米基缺席一场魔龙团战。

displayName.schinese: 纯正地狱之旅·甲级联赛

description.english: In Hell difficulty (without any other adjustments), promote to League 1.
description.schinese: 在十八层地狱难度（无其他子设定调整）下，晋级至甲级联赛。

displayName.schinese: 纯正地狱之旅·超级联赛

description.english: In Hell difficulty (without any other adjustments), promote to Premiere League.
description.schinese: 在十八层地狱难度（无其他子设定调整）下，晋级至超级联赛。

displayName.schinese: 纯正地狱之旅·制霸赛区

description.english: In Hell difficulty (without any other adjustments), claim the champion of Premier League.
description.schinese: 在十八层地狱难度（无其他子设定调整）下，获得超级联赛冠军。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 0.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度0完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 1.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度1完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 2.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度2完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 3.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度3完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 4.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度4完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 5.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度5完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage on Difficulty 6.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在难度6完成任意一个赛段。

description.english: "(TCS Division) Complete World Championship without consuming Insurance. -NOTE: Don't use ""skip last game"" because it consumes Insurance."
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在保存了失败保护机会的情况下完成世界赛（友情提示：到达世界赛后不要使用跳过最后一场功能，因为它会消耗失败保护）。

description.english: (TCS Division) Have a hero equipped with 6 Level-4 skills.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）让一个英雄装备了6个4星英雄技能。

description.english: (TCS Division) Unlock all slots of Extra Training.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）解锁所有的加训槽位。

displayName.schinese: 英雄池基础，训练点数不基础

description.english: (TCS Division) Complete any stage with at least 300 Training Points.
description.schinese: （征服者系列赛限定）在拥有至少300训练点数的情况下完成一个赛段。

description.english: Your Athlete becomes the first in the Hall of Fame.
description.schinese: 你的选手成为名人堂第1位。

description.english: The top 5 in the Hall of Fame are all your Athletes.
description.schinese: 名人堂的前5位都是你的选手。

description.english: After a game, one of your athletes has earned over 100 Highlight Points.
description.schinese: 在一场游戏后，你的一个选手获得了超过100点高光时刻积分。

description.english: (CPL/LTE Division) Win the World Championship.
description.schinese: （仅限大陆职业联赛和战术精英联盟）获得了世界赛冠军。

displayName.english: How Lonely It Is to Be Invincible

description.english: (CPL/LTE Division) Win the World Championship without any lose match.
description.schinese: （仅限大陆职业联赛和战术精英联盟）以全胜获得世界赛冠军。

description.english: Have an athlete equipped with 5 Level-4 skills.
description.schinese: 拥有一个装备了5个4级技能的选手。

description.english: All your starting Athletes have 3 backup SP cards.
description.schinese: 你的所有首发选手都有3张备用战术卡。

description.english: Reroll 5 times in a card shop.
description.schinese: 在一个卡牌商店中刷新5次。

description.english: Win a Showdown with Foso's shield exceeding his Max HP.
description.schinese: 使用佛索，在决战胜利时其护盾量超过最大生命值。

description.english: Use Quinn to kill 3 enemy units in a single action.
description.schinese: 使用葵，在一次行动中击杀3名敌方单位。

description.english: Use Qin Hu to ensure the Shield Guard participates in every Fight.
description.schinese: 使用秦虎，使盾卫参与每一场战斗。

description.english: Use Ada to complete all upgrades before Round 40.
description.schinese: 使用艾达，在40回合前完成全部升级。

displayName.english: I will strike in an invincible form.

description.english: Use Hass while having 4 or more different buff effects.
description.schinese: 使用哈斯，同时拥有4种以上不同的增益效果。

description.english: Use Justice to eliminate the enemy Nexus with Justice Execute.
description.schinese: 使用贾斯蒂斯，使用正义天降消灭敌方基地。

description.english: The club ranks 25th in the world.
description.schinese: 俱乐部世界排名达到第25。

description.english: Your TOP athlete ranks 25th in the world.
description.schinese: 你的上路选手世界排名达到第25。

description.english: Your JUG athlete ranks 25th in the world.
description.schinese: 你的打野选手世界排名达到第25。

description.english: Your MID athlete ranks 25th in the world.
description.schinese: 你的中路选手世界排名达到第25。

description.english: Your BOT athlete ranks 25th in the world.
description.schinese: 你的下路选手世界排名达到第25。

description.english: Your SUP athlete ranks No.25 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的辅助选手世界排名达到第25。

description.english: The club ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 俱乐部世界排名达到第1。

description.english: Your TOP athlete ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的上路选手世界排名达到第1。

description.english: Your JUG athlete ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的打野选手世界排名达到第1。

description.english: Your MID athlete ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的中路选手世界排名达到第1。

description.english: Your BOT athlete ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的下路选手世界排名达到第1。

description.english: Your SUP Athlete ranks No.1 in the world.
description.schinese: 你的辅助选手世界排名达到第1。

displayName.english: Scaling the Summit - The League of Tactical Elite
displayName.schinese: 攀登顶峰·战术精英联盟

description.english: (LTE Division) Enter the playoffs of the Premier League.
description.schinese: 进入战术精英联盟赛区的超级联赛季后赛。

displayName.english: Dominate the Division - The League of Tactical Elite
displayName.schinese: 制霸赛区·战术精英联盟

description.english: (LTE Division) Win the Premier League championship.
description.schinese: 夺得战术精英联盟赛区的超级联赛冠军。

description.english: (LTE Division) Accumulate the use of 50 different version rules.
description.schinese: 在战术精英联盟赛区，累计使用50种不同的版本规则。

description.english: (LTE Division) Ban a version rule that was previously used.
description.schinese: 在战术精英联盟赛区，禁用一个曾经使用过的版本规则。

description.english: (LTE Division) Ban the same version rule more than 3 times.
description.schinese: 在战术精英联盟赛区，对同一个版本规则禁用超过3次。

description.english: Sign a total of 12 athletes.
description.schinese: 累计签约了12名选手。

description.english: List a total of 10 athletes for sale.
description.schinese: 累计挂牌出售10名选手。

description.english: Sign at least 5 Athletes in one transfer window.
description.schinese: 在一个转会期与至少5名选手签约。

description.english: The venue's single income exceeds 3000000 (3M) budget.
description.schinese: 场馆的单次收入超过3000000(3M)预算。

description.english: Single match attendance exceeds 2000 in the venue.
description.schinese: 场馆的单次观赛人数超过2000人。

description.english: Have 1000000 followers in total.
description.schinese: 俱乐部选手的粉丝总数超过1000000。

description.english: The venue's spectator area achieved "full house" for the first time.
description.schinese: 场馆的观赛区的上座率首次达到"座无虚席"。

description.english: The venue's cumulative income exceeds 1000000 (1M) budget.
description.schinese: 场馆累计收入超过1000000(1M)预算。

description.english: The venue's cumulative income exceeds 10000000 (10M) budget.
description.schinese: 场馆累计收入超过10000000(10M)预算。

description.english: The venue's cumulative income exceeds 100000000 (100M) budget.
description.schinese: 场馆累计收入超过100000000(100M)预算。

displayName.schinese: 纯正地狱之旅·世界冠军

description.english: In Hell difficulty (without any other adjustments), claim the champion of World Championship.
description.schinese: 在十八层地狱难度（无其他子设定调整）下，获得世界赛冠军。
